Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted & 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cermak/Cicero
ShortDescription: Northbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Laramie. 16th and Cicero: due to, police activity near Cermak/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Laramie. 16th and Cicero: due to, police activity near Cermak/Cicero.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Cicero
ShortDescription: Eastbound  21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero and Cermak: due to, police activity near Cermak/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero and Cermak: due to, police activity near Cermak/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
